author: Thorin Klosowski
title: The Contractor's Bag
text:
Dalluge 7180 16 Ounce Titanium Hammer 
If you have a great go bag with a useful organization scheme and great features, let us know! You can share your bag by posting it to your personal Kinja blog using the tag featured bag or adding it to our Lifehacker Go Bag Show and Tell Flickr pool . Photos must be at least at least 800x450. Please include information about your bag, what you put in it, and any relevant details about how you made it awesome. If yours catches our eye, we might just feature it! Advertisement
